pr_title: [GSoC] Add Menu Component, Sidebar Component and Floating Action Button.
pr_body:
I have added three components: 
1) Menu Component- As part of the menu component, I have added the Options menu, Context menu, and Popup menu.
2) Sidebar
3) Floating Action Button
pr_labels: [{'name': 'pull request: needs reply to review'}, {'name': 'feature request'}, {'name': 'affects: ucr'}]
pr_review_comments:

Also see my note about making it compatible with dark mode. You can add a second rule `.ode-SimpleMockForm-Dark .ode-SimpleMockFormSidebar` after this one to set the background-color to black.', 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2020, 9, 1, 12, 58, 15, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'ewpatton', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 481122788, 'comment_body': "I'd rather that the FAB be created by the component itself and its logic managed there so that if people don't want it in the project it doesn't crash the app. Further, having the FAB on older versions of Android causes the companion to crash so its creation needs to be keyed to the earliest version of Android supported by the library, which is SDK 14 (Ice Cream Sandwich).", 'comment_created': datetime.datetime(2020, 9, 1, 13, 6, 52, tzinfo=datetime.timezone.utc), 'commenter': 'ewpatton', 'type': 'User'}, {'comment_id': 481123723, 'comment_body': 'Most of the logic additions in this file should be pushed down into the Form component.
